UserCode
Class Bubble

java.lang.Object
  UserCode.Bubble

public class Bubble
extends java.lang.Object

Bubbles contains all of the code needed to represent a Bubble to be placed in the Aquarium.

Version:
29-01-2021
Author:
Kristopher Randle

Constructor Detail

Bubble

public Bubble(double x,
              double y,
              double scale)
Constructor for objects of class Bubble

Parameters:
x - The initial X co-ordiate of the Bubble.
y - The initial Y co-ordinate of the Bubble.
scale - The scale (size) of the Bubble.
Method Detail

createSoundEffects

public void createSoundEffects()
METHOD: Initalises and populates the List 'soundEffects' with an appropriate selection of .wav files. Any 'Bubble' can play any one of these 'SoundEffect's at a time.

setPosition

protected void setPosition(double x,
                           double y)
METHOD: set the initial position of the Bubble in the aquarium - method from Marc Price, edited by Kristoper Randle.

Parameters:
x - the rqd position along the x axis
y - the rqd position along the y axis

update

public void update()
METHOD: to set the next frame of the simulation, called on each pass of the simulation.
